name: alquilalo-monorepo
description: Alquilalo - Plataforma de alquiler completa con React y Node.js

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:user && npm run build:admin
scripts.build:user: cd frontend/user && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd frontend/admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: cd api && npm install && cd ../frontend/user && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.test: cd frontend/user && npm test && cd ../admin && npm test
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/user/build frontend/admin/build node_modules api/node_modules frontend/user/node_modules frontend/admin/node_modules

author: JuanProgramador Argentina
